bibl.title: "A Dwelling Place of Christ, A Healing Place of Knowledge": The Non-Chalcedonian Eucharist in Late Antique Egypt and Its Setting.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Susan C. Karant-Nunn (Ed.), Varieties of Devotion in the Middle Ages and Renaissance = Arizona Studies in the Middle Ages and the Renaissance. 7 (Turnhout, 2003) pp. 1-16.
